title: WE WERE ATTACKED JUST OFF JAELA, SAYS DR. WICKREMABAHU
content: December 08, 2010: We were attacked just off Jaela, says the Leader of the New Left Front Dr. Wickremabahu Karunaratne He was addressing a meeting convened to brief the media on the incident that he had to face at the Katunayake airport after returning from a tour in the United Kingdom. “I went to London…
